reviews.text: Our son had the best 3rd birthday at PICNIC. It was so easy to book and the team was incredibly helpful before and on the day I was blown away with how great the team onsite was. They helped me so much and took all the stress out of the day. The kids all had a wonderful time too. Highly recommend for parties thank you PICNIC team!

We visited with my eldest in 2021 and loved the concept. Now returning with my 3 year old and 8 month old and the venue and props are looking very tired. The toys show signs of wear and soft furnishings are bobbly. There was a bobbly felt toy on the post box which I guess was supposed to resemble a package for a postman but looked more like a chewed dog toy. It's annoying that there is so little to interact with during role play. The kettle was missing the button to press, the toaster didn't pop up, the first aid kit only had a stethoscope, the weighing scales in the doctors didn't really work and the fire station was missing the phone. Most disappointingly, the supermarket doesn't have a scanner or a till so you can't pretend to scan or pay. I am able to do better role play with my son's till and toy food at home.
I honestly won't be taking my 3 year old again as there was so little for him to actually engage with. We have been spoilt by visiting the Little Lancashire Village when we stay with family and the facilities, props and pricing is just 10x better. There is so much for him to do there and the toys seem to be updated regularly to increase the child's experience every time they return. Please invest some of your profits back into the venue to update and improve the play experience for the children.

We had a 5th birthday party here and everything was brilliant. In the lead up the planning and communication between ourselves and picnic was so easy and quick. On the day of the party everything was brilliant, all well planned, relaxed and most of all the kids had a fab time. The food for the kids was lovely, a really good variety and the fruit platter was amazing. The staff were friendly, attentive, accommodating and so professional. All the parents spoke very highly of the venue and the staff. Thank you for an amazing party for our son.

Fun play area for kids. Especially for party hosting. The staff are great and helpful. The kids really enjoy it. Can host up to 30 kids. Will definitely consider for my toddlers birthday. Can host a party up to the age of 5 yrs.

We had an exclusive hire birthday party here and they did a fantastic job. Booking and communication pre-party were good, set-up and service on the day were excellent. The kids had a wonderful time, and adults too! I would highly recommend for parties for 2-4 year olds.

address: Unit 3, Rotunda Centre, Kingston upon Thames KT1 1QJ, United Kingdom
